DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether prophylactic antibiotic use in inguinal hernioplasty are effective in prevention of infectious complication.
DOC.criteria: Primary inguinal hernia Elective surgery Must be older than 20 years of age Must not have any serious complication Incarceration Recurrence Drug allergy Diabetes mellitus Malignant diseases Serious heart diseases Psychological diseases Pregnancy Have been medicated with corticosteroids
